definitions.definition: ( originally Christianity ) A festival or holiday commemorating the birth of Jesus Christ and incorporating various Christian , pre-Christian , pagan , and secular customs , which in Western Christianity is celebrated on December 25 ( Christmas Day ) in most places .
examples: This Christmas we’ll open presents, then go to grandma’s for dinner.

definitions.definition: ( often marketing ) Ellipsis of Christmas season ( “ the period of time before and after Christmas Day, during which people prepare for and celebrate Christmas ” ) ; Christmastime .
examples: The last three Christmases have been good for retailers.
Christmas shoppers spent less this December than last year, but our store will probably see just as many returned items during the twelve days of Christmas.

definitions.definition: A number of places in the United States :

subdefinitions.definition: An uninhabited mining community in Gila County , Arizona .
A census-designated place in Orange County , Florida .
An unincorporated community in Au Train Township, Alger County , Michigan .
An unincorporated community in Bolivar County , Mississippi .

main_definition: ( originally Christianity ) A festival or holiday commemorating the birth of Jesus Christ and incorporating various Christian , pre-Christian , pagan , and secular customs , which in Western Christianity is celebrated on December 25 ( Christmas Day ) in most places .
secondary_definitions: ( often marketing ) Ellipsis of Christmas season ( “ the period of time before and after Christmas Day, during which people prepare for and celebrate Christmas ” ) ; Christmastime .
A number of places in the United States :

definitions.definition: Sprigs of holly and other evergreen plants used as Christmas decorations ; also ( generally ) , any Christmas decorations.

main_definition: ( informal or British , regional ) Sprigs of holly and other evergreen plants used as Christmas decorations ; also ( generally ) , any Christmas decorations.
